code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./css/DoorPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DoorList=_ref=>{let{zone}=_ref;const doorData={all:{"Porte A":20,"Porte B":50,"Porte C":80},zone1:{"Porte A":10,"Porte B":40,"Porte C":70},zone2:{"Porte A":30,"Porte B":60,"Porte C":90},zone3:{"Porte A":25,"Porte B":55,"Porte C":85}};const filteredDoors=Object.entries(doorData[zone]).sort((a,b)=>a[1]-b[1]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:filteredDoors.map(_ref2=>{let[door,frequency]=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:door}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[frequency,"% de fr\xE9quentation"]})]},door);})});};const DoorsPage=()=>{const[zone,setZone]=useState('all');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Portes moins fr\xE9quent\xE9es"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Consultez les portes d'acc\xE8s les moins fr\xE9quent\xE9es pour un acc\xE8s rapide et fluide au stade."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Filtrer par zone :"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:zone,onChange:e=>setZone(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"all",children:"Toutes les zones"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"zone1",children:"Zone 1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"zone2",children:"Zone 2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"zone3",children:"Zone 3"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DoorList,{zone:zone})]});};export default DoorsPage;
